Blog.post: Hey! I'm back. I had a resurection(kinda thing) happening to me, all at once, just when I gave my blogspot ID to OJ at BLOG '03. I firmly belive in my conscience and that told me, to re-construct my blogs. Gettin You all Back again!! LinktoComments(' ') urlLink ">Comment

They have a growing fan-club, CD's and cassettes flying away at the shopping stands and I'm no expection to fall in love with their songs...

Yeah... Missin' Eminem and his new song "My Band" feat. D12. Yo! ne one listen to and look at the video. Couched a day long on the TV and finally got out when it was hosted. Anyway gotcha wait for the next time... Update: Getcha self more into the data at urlLink Launch Cast

urlLink urlLink Courtesy (pic): urlLink [Lycos]Tripod member The born classic carnatic singer has been admitted for special care at a private hospital in Chennai (India) reporting high blood-sugar level. Now She is doing fine. At times, I felt guilty as for a MUSIC lover, I lest paid attention to this renowned singer, though I had watched her in TV on her concerts. Hope... I'd do pay sincere attention for the *love* of musique. urlLink More info about the singer's health...

urlLink urlLink Artwork by BenVsBen 2004 Courtesy (pic): urlLink MTV.com The BEP [Black Eyed Peas] are seeing better days and with their new album (3rd album) - *Elephunk*, it is more catchy than any other Hip-Hop. The band started off with Will.I.Am, who thought 'break dancing' and 'hip-hop' should take a turn, and which would grab more attention than the gangsta wangsta revolution, during the 1990's. Now, in the 2000's it is seen with a weather of change. And nothing's more than this, just... SHUT UP! :)

urlLink urlLink Artwork by BenVsBen 2004 Courtesy (pic): urlLink MTV.com | urlLink Corbis.com Usher and Yeah! (feat. Ludacris) kept No.1 at the World Chart of music. Usher has been in R&B for more than 10 years (that doesn't makes him, less vulnerable to Justin's). But still, Justin's music lovers *just* seem to confuse with the style both have it on their music. Both are talented guys, but in two different genres, R&B and Pop. Anyway it is good listening to Usher's latest flicks - Yeah!, Burn and most of em in Confessions, but the time You are reading this post, it would be Avril Lavigne and her latest flick. Avril Lavigne is seen with her latest album and a hit singles as the # 1. Avril Lavigne makes it with her new not-so-bedfellow Slipknot. Time for Mr. Entertainment to be entertained.
